title: Massive swells smash windows at Sydney's Bondi Beach
snippets: A powerful king tide smashed glass, cracked footpaths and caused residents to evacuate as it battered Sydney's coast line.
summary: A powerful king tide hit Sydney's coast, causing significant damage including smashed glass and cracked footpaths, leading to the evacuation of residents.
titles: Massive swells smash windows at Sydney's Bondi Beach

title: Three big unknowns ahead of Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs
snippets: The president is expected to unveil details of his plans for a wider set of import taxes. But what tariffs and when?
summary: The president is anticipated to announce specifics regarding an expansion of import taxes, including which tariffs will be implemented and their timing.
titles: Three big unknowns ahead of Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs

title: Israel to expand military operation and seize 'large areas' of Gaza
snippets: Defence Minister Israel Katz said this would require a large-scale evacuation of Palestinians.
summary: Defence Minister Israel Katz announced plans necessitating the extensive relocation of Palestinians.
titles: Israel to expand military operation and seize 'large areas' of Gaza

title: BBC finds fear, loss and hope in Sudan's ruined capital after army victory
snippets: Our correspondent enters Khartoum just days after Sudan's army recaptured it from the Rapid Support Forces after a six-month offensive.
summary: Sudan's army has successfully recaptured Khartoum from the Rapid Support Forces following a six-month offensive. This development occurred just days before our correspondent's arrival in the city.
titles: BBC finds fear, loss and hope in Sudan's ruined capital after army victory

title: 23 more women make allegations against serial rapist
snippets: Police in London say PhD student Zhenhao Zou's "offending group is far greater" than they had realised.
summary: London police have stated that the criminal group associated with PhD student Zhenhao Zou is significantly larger than initially believed.
titles: 23 more women make allegations against serial rapist

title: Arteta 'worried' by Arsenal's fresh injury crisis
snippets: Arsenal face a potential injury crisis in defense ahead of their Champions League showdown with Real Madrid after Gabriel Magalhães and Jurriën Timber picked up injuries in Tuesday's Premier League win over Fulham.
summary: Arsenal could face a defensive challenge in their upcoming Champions League match against Real Madrid due to injuries sustained by defenders Gabriel Magalhães and Jurriën Timber during their Premier League victory over Fulham on Tuesday.
titles: Arteta 'worried' by Arsenal's fresh injury crisis

title: Alex Ovechkin goals tracker: Capitals star four away from breaking Wayne Gretzky's all-time record
snippets: At his season-long scoring pace, Ovechkin would pass the 'The Great One' in the final game of the season
summary: Alex Ovechkin is on track to surpass Wayne Gretzky's all-time scoring record in the final game of the current NHL season, based on his scoring rate throughout the season.
titles: Alex Ovechkin goals tracker: Capitals star four away from breaking Wayne Gretzky's all-time record

title: £37m asking price: Arsenal, Man Utd & Chelsea on alert as transfer plan in place
snippets: Arsenal, Manchester United and Chelsea are reportedly among the clubs on alert for the potential transfer of Juventus striker Dusan Vlahovic.It looks increasingly like a decision has already been made...
summary: Arsenal, Manchester United, and Chelsea are reportedly interested in signing Juventus striker Dusan Vlahovic. There are indications that a decision regarding his potential transfer may have been made.
titles: £37m asking price: Arsenal, Man Utd & Chelsea on alert as transfer plan in place

title: Wolves spoil Jokic's 61-point triple-double in 2OT
snippets: The Timberwolves overcame a career- and NBA-best 61-point triple-double performance from Nikola Jokic to outlast the Nuggets 140-139 in double overtime on Tuesday night.
summary: The Timberwolves defeated the Nuggets 140-139 in a double-overtime game on Tuesday, despite Nikola Jokic's record-setting 61-point triple-double, the highest in NBA history for such a performance.
titles: Wolves spoil Jokic's 61-point triple-double in 2OT

title: Curry drops 52 in wild win vs. Grizz: 'Tank is full'
snippets: Stephen Curry had 52 points and 12 3-pointers as the Warriors held on for a wild 134-125 win over the Grizzlies on Tuesday night.
summary: Stephen Curry scored 52 points, including 12 3-pointers, leading the Warriors to a 134-125 victory over the Grizzlies on Tuesday night.
titles: Curry drops 52 in wild win vs. Grizz: 'Tank is full'

title: How Trump is exploiting Big Law’s identity crisis
snippets: Firms like Paul Weiss have hired star lawyers to expand in dealmaking. Fear of losing business has made them less willing to have a fight with the government
summary: Law firms, including Paul Weiss, are hiring prominent lawyers to grow their dealmaking sectors. This expansion strategy is partly driven by concerns over losing business, leading these firms to avoid conflicts with government authorities.
titles: How Trump is exploiting Big Law’s identity crisis

title: Investors on edge as White House vows new tariffs ‘immediately’
snippets: Fund managers avoid big bets as US president prepares to escalate trade war on ‘liberation day’
summary: Fund managers are being cautious, avoiding large investments as the US president plans to intensify the trade war on what is being referred to as 'liberation day'.
titles: Investors on edge as White House vows new tariffs ‘immediately’

title: China senses an opportunity in Trump’s cultural revolution
snippets: Policymakers in Beijing believe they will benefit from the destruction of America’s global credibility
summary: Policymakers in Beijing are of the view that the deterioration of America's global credibility will be advantageous to them.
titles: China senses an opportunity in Trump’s cultural revolution

title: How our social structures shape our DNA — and vice versa
snippets: If society is shot through with genetic influences, how should social inequality be addressed?
summary: The discussion revolves around the role of genetic factors in societal structures and the implications for addressing social inequality. It questions how to effectively tackle disparities if genetics play a significant role in shaping society.
titles: How our social structures shape our DNA — and vice versa

title: Musk-backed judge loses Wisconsin race as liberals surge
snippets: Republicans retain US House seats in Florida special elections but Democratic vote rises
summary: Republicans successfully held onto their US House seats in Florida during special elections, despite an observed increase in votes for the Democratic candidates.
titles: Musk-backed judge loses Wisconsin race as liberals surge

title: Rocky Mountain snow is contaminated, study shows
snippets: Mountain snowpacks accumulate snow throughout the winter, building up stores of water that will supply communities across the American West throughout the long dry season. Now, a new study shows that as storms carry snow to the Rocky Mountains, they are also bringing mercury and other contaminants from mines in the region. The research helps scientists understand how contaminants are spread by atmospheric circulation and has implications for snowpack preservation and illuminating the lasting environmental impact of mining activities.
summary: A new study reveals that storms transporting snow to the Rocky Mountains are also carrying mercury and other contaminants from regional mines. This accumulation affects the snowpacks that supply water to the American West, highlighting the environmental impact of mining and the role of atmospheric circulation in spreading contaminants.
titles: Rocky Mountain snow is contaminated, study shows

title: New insight into factors associated with a common disease among dogs and humans
snippets: For dogs housed at Texas kennels, age and fecal score are important factors for screening for subclinical Giardia infections.
summary: Research indicates that for dogs in Texas kennels, their age and fecal score are key indicators in identifying subclinical Giardia infections, suggesting these factors are crucial for effective screening.
titles: New insight into factors associated with a common disease among dogs and humans

title: Metasurfaces: Bilayer device can control many forms of polarized light
snippets: Researchers have created a bilayer metasurface made of two stacked layers of titanium dioxide nanostructures, opening new possibilities for structuring light.
summary: Researchers have developed a new bilayer metasurface composed of two layers of titanium dioxide nanostructures. This innovation offers fresh opportunities for manipulating light.
titles: Metasurfaces: Bilayer device can control many forms of polarized light

title: Combination immunotherapy shrank a variety of metastatic gastrointestinal cancers
snippets: A new form of tumor infiltrating lymphocyte (TIL) therapy, a form of personalized cancer immunotherapy, dramatically improved the treatment's effectiveness in patients with metastatic gastrointestinal cancers, according to results of a clinical trial. The findings offer hope that this therapy could be used to treat a variety of solid tumors, which has so far eluded researchers developing cell-based therapies.
summary: A clinical trial has shown that a new version of tumor infiltrating lymphocyte (TIL) therapy, a personalized cancer immunotherapy, significantly enhanced treatment outcomes for patients with metastatic gastrointestinal cancers. This advancement raises the possibility of using the therapy for a broader range of solid tumors, expanding the potential applications of cell-based cancer treatments.
titles: Combination immunotherapy shrank a variety of metastatic gastrointestinal cancers

title: Surprising number of environmental pollutants in hedgehogs
snippets: Lead, pesticides, brominated flame retardants, plastic additives, polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs), and heavy metals. This is what researchers found when they collected dead hedgehogs to investigate the environmental pollutants found in urban environments.
summary: Researchers investigating environmental pollutants in urban areas found lead, pesticides, brominated flame retardants, plastic additives, polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs), and heavy metals in dead hedgehogs collected for study.
titles: Surprising number of environmental pollutants in hedgehogs
